name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Creative Mobile Video Editing
base_name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Creative Mobile Video Editing
long_desc: Many professional and amateur photographers are using their smartphones to shoot video projects. With the right photography techniques and editing applications, smartphones can be used to produce creative film content. This course introduces students to the world of video editing and creative content creation. Students will learn basic video editing techniques using only their phone. Combined with their imagination, students will be able to produce artistic short videos.
